module.name: condition_evaluation
module.keywords: module, condition, criterion, evaluation, assertion, record
module.purpose: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of condition evaluation data.

inscope.li: identification of the object being evaluated;
the recording of parameter values evaluated and evaluation outcome;
the recording of the result of condition evaluated;
the recording of the result of criteria elements evaluated.

outscope.li: evaluation of objects not identifiable by an ISO 10303 specified entity and its associated identifier;
the computation or conversion of parameter values;
parameter values directly represenrted by physical signals;
identification and access of objects implied by a class hierarchy.
